anjalina jolita ‘garl intarraptad’ ranganayata hondama sahaya niliya lesin labunu sammanaya da, ‘gost’ ranganayata hondama sahaya niliya lesin wupi goldbargta labunu sammanaya da, ‘munstrak’ ranganayata olimpiya dukakista labunu sammanaya da ‘on da wotarfa්rant’ ranganayata malan brandota labunu sammanaya da, ‘kresi hat’ ranganayata jef brijasta labunu sammanaya da, magarat oo brinta lama niliyaka lesa labunu sammanaya da, ‘goyin mayi we’ sinamapatayata bin krosbita labunu sammanaya da, ‘gon with da wind’ sinamapatayata hati mak daniyalta labunu sammanaya da athurudan wu oskar sammana athara thibe.
